# ai-trackdown Framework - Project Index
# Generated: 2025-01-07T15:30:00Z
# Format: llms.txt v1.0

## Project Overview
ai-trackdown Framework - Lightweight AI-native task management system
Status: Active Development (Ready for Release)
Documentation-only project focused on markdown-based task management

## Project Structure
/docs/: Core design documentation and architecture
/templates/: Complete markdown template library  
/examples/: Realistic project demonstrations
/.ai-trackdown/: Framework configuration
/TASKTRACK.md: Project dashboard and status

## Current Focus
- Core documentation framework: COMPLETED âœ…
- Template library creation: COMPLETED âœ…  
- Example project demonstration: COMPLETED âœ…
- Self-implementation: IN PROGRESS ðŸ”„

## Key Features
- Pure markdown/text storage using GitHub Flavored Markdown
- Native llms.txt standard for AI discoverability
- Git-native with automatic state management
- Token usage tracking at task/epic/project levels
- Zero external dependencies for core functionality

## Quick Commands (Manual Process)
Create new epic: Copy from /templates/epic-template.md
Create new issue: Copy from /templates/issue-template.md  
Create new task: Copy from /templates/task-template.md
View examples: Check /examples/complete-project/

## Documentation Files
- ai-tasktrack-design-doc.md: Complete system specification
- README.md: Project overview and getting started
- templates/: Ready-to-use markdown templates
- examples/: Full project demonstrations

## Token Budget
Total: 50,000 tokens
Used: ~12,000 tokens (24%)
Primary Agent: Claude PM Assistant
Focus: Documentation and template creation
